title: Implement mouse camera controls
description:
Original FSN has mouse handlers registered:
- gl_motion_handler (PointerMotionMask 0x10)
- gl_button_callback
- gl_event_handler

Need to:
1. Find and extract these handlers from fsn.c
2. Implement camera pan/rotate based on mouse movement
3. Wire up to GL widget event handlers

This would allow manually exploring the scene to debug block positions.

title: Extract draw_directory_recursive from fsn.c
description: Extracted functions to src/draw_tree.c. BLOCKER: GP-indirect calls need resolution. Clean functions (draw_directories, draw_dir) work. GP-indirect ones (process_tree_node, draw_file_icon, draw_directory_recursive) crash on x86_64.

notes: COMPLETED: Module boundary analysis complete. Identified 6 primary modules: ui_motif (412 funcs), graphics_gl (171), filesystem (74), datastructures (62), picking (18), main (entry point). 1521 functions in 'utility' category need manual review in Phase 3/4. 1. Cataloged 366 FUN_ function definitions (1316 references) - categorized by purpose
2. Cataloged 451 DAT_ global variables - categorized by usage  
3. Mapped 46 SGI GL calls to OpenGL equivalents (560 call sites total)

title: Extract icons.c module
description: Extract 21 icon/image management functions. Handle icon rendering, file type rules.

title: Clean up in_register_* Ghidra artifacts
description: Fix uninitialized in_register_* variables in warp.c and other files. These are Ghidra decompilation artifacts representing MIPS register state. Locations: warp.c:314 (in_register_00001020), warp.c:426 (in_f18), warp.c:451 (in_register_00001000). Requires disassembly analysis to determine actual values.

title: Extract x11_wrappers.c module
description: Extract 24 X11/Xlib wrapper functions from fsn.c. Low coupling, self-contained. Ready to extract first.
notes: NOT NEEDED: X11 'wrappers' in decompiled code are broken library stubs (GP indirect calls). Will link against actual libX11. FSN code that USES X11 belongs in other modules (ui_motif, init).

title: Extract graphics_gl.c module

- [ ] Depends only on datastructures and picking
notes:
EXTRACTION COMPLETE - 111 functions extracted (7,423 lines!)

THE BIG ONE - Largest module by far. Contains entire OpenGL/SGI GL rendering pipeline.

Functions by category:
- SGI GL primitives (22): bgn*/end* for lines/points/polygons, arc*, rect*, circf, move2, draw2, beam*
- Graphics state & rendering (23): gl_push/pop_state, matrix ops, projection, clearing, color, scene control
- Drawing functions (18): draw*, drawOverview*
- Highlighting (9): highlight*
- Location/picking (6): locate*, overviewPickPointer
- Color conversions (15): rgb_to_*, *_to_rgb, rgbcomplement
- Colormap/visual (7): SG_get*, allocOverlayColor, makeColorBox*
- Utility (11): calc_*_angle, check_visibility, FAMDebugLevel, GlobMatch, etc.

Missing (5): draw_dir, draw_special, highlightSpecialDir, draw_file, bsearch2 (already extracted or format mismatch)

Note: Original estimate 150-200 functions. Actually extracted 111 but with 7,423 lines - these are complex rendering functions with substantial implementations.

notes: COMPLETED: Phase 2 Header Extraction & Type System complete. Created 5 core headers: fsn_types.h (replaces undefined* with int32_t etc), fsn_std.h (standard C includes), fsn_motif.h (X11/Motif), fsn_gl.h (OpenGL + SGI GL compat macros), fsn.h (master header). Added C/C++ compatibility for GLM. test_headers.c validates compilation. Build system updated, test passes successfully. title: Add missed GL functions to graphics_gl.c
description: During miscellaneous cleanup, identified ~29 SGI GL functions that should have been in graphics_gl.c: draw_dir, draw_file, draw_special, highlightSpecialDir, and various GL primitives (v2f, v2i, v2s, v3f, rotate, scale, translate, viewport, pushname, popname, loadname, text, setpattern, etc.)
design:
Missed GL functions from miscellaneous analysis:
Drawing: draw_dir, draw_file, draw_special, highlightSpecialDir
GL Primitives: v2f, v2i, v2s, v3f, pdr2, pmv2
Transformations: rotate, scale, translate, viewport
Picking: pushname, popname, loadname
Rendering: text, setpattern, shademodel, spotlight, subpixel, swapbuffers
Utilities: getgdesc, gflush, gmatch, pclos, wmpack, zwritemask

Priority P2 - can be done during integration/cleanup phase.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Identify all missed GL functions from miscellaneous
- [ ] Add to graphics_gl.c
- [ ] Update graphics_gl.h
- [ ] Test compilation

title: Phase 5: SGI GL to OpenGL Port
description: Convert all SGI Graphics Library calls to modern OpenGL equivalents
design: Convert SGI IRIX GL to OpenGL equivalents. For picking system: IRIX GL picking APIs (gselect/pick/endpick) will be replaced with raycasting implementation using GLM library. Raycasting approach: cast ray from mouse position through view frustum, test intersection with scene geometry.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Primitive functions mapped (rect/circf → GL vertex arrays/buffers)
- [ ] Picking system converted (gselect/pick → GL selection or raycasting)
- [ ] Transform operations updated (SGI matrix → GLM or manual matrices)  
- [ ] Mesh/polygon rendering modernized (bgnpolygon → VBO/VAO)
- [ ] Each conversion tested incrementally
- [ ] All SGI GL calls eliminated from codebase
notes: Created fsn_igl library: 64-bit safe SGI GL compatibility layer adapted from irix-igl. Implements ~60 SGI GL functions (clear, matrix ops, primitives, color, picking, text). Build verified - all types are 64-bit safe. Updated drawing.c to use fsn_igl.h.
